mapper.select: SELECT US.USER_ID ,US.USER_NAME ,US.AGE ,US.GMAIL ,US.DESCRIPTION ,RL.ROLE_ID ,RL.ROLE_NAME FROM system.F8_USER US JOIN system.F8_ROLE RL ON US.ROLE_ID = RL.ROLE_ID ORDER BY US.USER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system.F8_USER (USER_ID, USER_NAME, ROLE_ID, AGE, GMAIL, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{roleId}, #{age}, #{gmail}, #{description})
